article_text:
Advertisement

In an editorial and mock front page, the Globe Editorial board has outlined its vision of what Donald Trump’s America could look like a year from now. Many Americans might find this vision appealing, but the Globe’s editorial board finds it deeply troubling. Discuss your thoughts below.

og.title: Discuss: Trump’s vision for America - The Boston Globe
